Why I Don't Use Wordpress

Graham

Wordpress powers around 40% of websites on the Internet. I chose not to use Wordpress, instead settling for Jekyll where possible. Here I discuss my reasons for doing so and why I think that Wordpress shouldn't be considered a "one box fits all" product.
